channel.title: Server help (mod levels and other issues)
channel.description:
Hello everybody! I just downloaded the TrisidiaX source and was wondering what should I start off with? (What should I edit first, change, etc.)
Also, What are the mod levels? I know 0=normal player, but after that no clue.
Much appreciated!

item.title: Server help (mod levels and other issues)
item.dc:creator: @nerd123456789 ...nerd123456789
item.description:
@nerd123456789 wrote:

to add it you can add it in:commands.java or client.java cant remember for that source check a tutorial and you’ll be fine

Read full topic
item.source: Server help (mod levels and other issues)

item.title: Server help (mod levels and other issues)
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

0 = player, 1 = mod, 2 = admin, 3 = owner.

For a guide on project insanity:

http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/334046-complete-noob-project-insanityguide-tips-making-good-rsps.html

Read full topic
item.source: Server help (mod levels and other issues)
